nodes.bodyText: Is it possible that components has additional components that pipeline_proto.components does not?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -562,9 +569,10 @@ def copy_subtransforms(transform):
       copy_subtransforms(transform)
     else:
       transform = stage.executable_stage_transform(
-          known_runner_urns, all_consumers, components)
+          known_runner_urns, all_consumers, pipeline_proto.components)

nodes.bodyText: Yes but this is still safe to do. The only additional components in components but not pipeline_proto.components are executable stage transforms, and these are not used within executable_stage_transform() - in fact executable_stage_transform() does not use the transforms in the passed in components at all.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -562,9 +569,10 @@ def copy_subtransforms(transform):
       copy_subtransforms(transform)
     else:
       transform = stage.executable_stage_transform(
-          known_runner_urns, all_consumers, components)
+          known_runner_urns, all_consumers, pipeline_proto.components)
